value:
$WmMPID_エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Here you are at last. We've been
waiting for you. It seems that your
sibling bond is strong indeed.$k$pBut it cannot be as strong as the
one that binds Eirika and me.$k$pOurs is so strong that some fools
dare to spread lies about us.
Disgusting.$k$p$WmMPID_エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Ephraim, please. They want to
battle, not hear you rant.$k$pApologies again. Now, will you break
the contract that binds us?$k$pLet's find out.$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Defeated? I can't believe it. I'm...
I'm sorry, Eirika.$k$pMy pride got the best of me.
And my lance usually serves
me better, but this time...$k$p$WmMPID_エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Brother, your pride might blind
you from time to time, but it's
my fault that we lost.$k$pI'm not as strong as you are,
so you had to make up for my
lapses in battle. I'm sorry.$k$p$WmMPID_エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Sure I watch out for you in battle,
Eirika, but that's not your fault.
I'm just your older brother!$k$pI've been watching out for you
ever since before we were
born...$k$p$WmMPID_セリス,ch06_00_Celice_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Pardon me. May I interrupt?$k$pTravelers, we must all thank
you, for now we are finally free
to return to our worlds.$k$p$WmMPID_ユリア,ch06_03_Yuria_F_Normal,Face|$w0|If ever we meet again...you must
let us repay...your kindness.$k$p$WmMPID_エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Right. And if we do meet again,
I want another chance to test
my lance against you people.$k$pEirika, you and I are going to
double our usual training as soon
as we get home.$k$p$WmMPID_エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Oh, Ephraim. These good people
will hopefully be our allies, not
just your sparring partners.$k$pNow, good-bye to all of you. I do
hope we can meet again—and
in the best of ways.$k
